function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Misrepresentation of human activity due to the use of simple aggregation measures based on zip code boundaries.","Impact":"Inaccurate representation of human activity and travel behavior.","Mitigation":"Use alternative data aggregation methods that account for individual travel behavior and activity radius.","Technologies":"Geospatial analysis tools, mobility simulation software.","People":"Researchers, urban planners, public health officials.","Owner":"Researchers, data analysts, urban planners."}]}
